review: Great little device if you have subscriptions that you pay for and need a way to remotely access them. Plex Netflix and watchespn make it a pretty nice STB replacement in a room where i dont have any hard wire hookups.
author: Logan Cox

review: This is really cool! This is the same concept as the apple tv but is so much cheaper for the product AND the movies, etc. on there. Especially if youre a prime user because then you have access to a ton of different free movies, shows and music. VERY much worth the money! Got this to replace my cable :) and have not missed it once. Can put netflix on it too, so we havent used the apple tv since we got this
